Articles.Content:
I was thinking it would be fantastic to be able to install mods in the save file location and have them load only when playing on that particular save. For example I could have a near-stock career save with only Engineer Redux and one sandbox which loads Real Solar System, FAR and whatever else I need.

I think this would be relatively easy to implement (doesn't sound that difficult) and it would remove the need for multiple game copies.
You could have 2 game maps, 1 modded and 1 vanilla

Yes, sth like that would be nice, but it isn't easy to implement the way the current mod-system works. Actually, any permissive mod system that allows modders to do nearly anything cannot really force a mod to "disappear", again.
